content.text:
I think we're on the same page on all of those points, I'm happy to iterate as we figure out what works.

I don't have any strong feelings on the specifics of the agree but it's important to me that it's finished before we sign. I would've been happy to sign almost any set of rules, but I don't feel comfortable signing unfinished agreements *in general*.

I would have been comfortable with "Alanna makes all decisions until a new set of rules is agreed upon", but signing "[insert name] makes all decisions until [insert condition]" doesn't feel right to me.
